# dropInteraction(_:sessionDidEnter:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate the drop session has moved into the drop interaction’s view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func dropInteraction(_ interaction: UIDropInteraction, sessionDidEnter session: any UIDropSession)
```

## Parameters

- **interaction**: The interaction that called this method.
- **session**: The drop session that has moved into the interaction’s view.

## Tracking the drop movements

- **dropInteraction(_:sessionDidUpdate:)**: Tells the delegate the drop session has changed.
- **dropInteraction(_:sessionDidExit:)**: Tells the delegate the drop session has moved out of the drop interaction’s view.
- **dropInteraction(_:sessionDidEnd:)**: Tells the delegate the drop session has ended.
